response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the potential it holds for your operations, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value, making it an attractive opportunity for you. I look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your company's performance. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
